handle.description: The handle on an open stream.

data.description: The base64-encoded data to append to the stream. This has a limit of 1 MB.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Appends a block of data to the stream specified by the input handle. If the handle does not exist, this call will throw an exception with
